Package cofproject.tau.android.cof

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ButtonsFragment.ButtonsFragmentListener
    An interface allowing the filtering activity which uses a button fragment to perform operations based on its inner data, with a guarantee that the fragment was created.
    ParametersFragment.OnFinishedCreateView  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ButtonsFragment
    A Fragment class responsible for the buttons at the bottom of the screen.
    CoF
    This class implements the different methods involved with the Co-Occurrence Filter, as described in the original article.
    FilteringActivity
    In this activity all the filtering process occurs - the image is loaded and then the user is able to choose parameters, scribble on the image, and filter it using either CoF or FB-CoF.
    FilterSettingsActivity  
    ImageViewFragment
    The fragment holds the different images throughout the filtering process
    InfoActivity
    This activity shows some information about the application.
    MainActivity  
    MyImageView
    A class extending Android's AppCompatImageView, adding drawing abilities.
    ParametersFragment
    Created by Uri on 16/11/2017.
    Preset  
    SigmaValueWatcher  
    SpinnerReselect  
    SplashActivity
    Starts the splash activity (intro screen) of the application.
    StringNameWatcher
    Created by Uri on 29/11/2017.
